refactors.title: Orchestration Decoupling
refactors.trigger: main.js was becoming a 'God Object' handling too many responsibilities.
refactors.result: Encapsulated orchestration in core/engine.js; reduced main.js complexity; logic is now reusable.

refactors.title: Transport Abstraction
refactors.trigger: Direct coupling to NetworkSimulator hindered future UDP support.
refactors.result: Established Transport base class; engine is now network-agnostic and ready for real UDP transport.

refactors.title: WorkerPool Dependency Injection
refactors.trigger: Inability to test encoder/decoder logic without spawning real threads.
refactors.result: Encoder and Decoder now accept injected pools; enables easier testing and resource sharing.

refactors.title: Module Sampler (Library Index)
refactors.trigger: Deep folder nesting made the project difficult to integrate as a library.
refactors.result: Created index.js as a central registry; project can now be required as a single module.

refactors.title: OPTIMISE Protocol Implementation
refactors.result: Established OPTIMISE_V1 protocol and update helper script

refactors.title: Refactor Matrix Standardization
refactors.result: Successfully renamed and updated all references

refactors.title: Roadmap Consolidation
refactors.trigger: Asset fragmentation and schema inconsistency in planning documents
refactors.result: Unified all roadmap assets into modular docs/roadmap.json and updated documentation compiler

refactors.title: Warden Modularization
refactors.trigger: Tight coupling of handlers and redundant protocol loading across tools.
refactors.result: Decoupled engine logic into shared lib/handlers and lib/loader; improved architectural scalability.
